WillContactYou: Thanks. Someone will be in touch with you.

MailSentMsgResend: Verification link expired. Please search for the most recent email or click resend now to receive a new verification email.
DidNotGetEmail: Did not get a verification email?
NotYetVerified: Your account has not yet been verified. Are you having trouble with the link in the email?
AlreadySignUp: It looks like you're already signed up
ReceiveResetLink: Please enter the email associated with your account, and we’ll send a link to reset your password
CheckEmail: Please check your email. You should have received an email with a link to reset your password.
ResetAndCreate: Your old password has been reset. Set up a new password.
SuccessResetPswd: Your password has been reset successfully. Login with your new password.
AccountLockedMsg: Your account has been locked due to too many failed login attempts
ques1: Which General Ledger application do you use?
ErrorInVerifying: Error while verifying your account. Try again or contact us via email at cs@centime.com or chat if the problem persists.
maximumAttemptText: You have exceeded the maximum number password reset retries
LoggedOut: You are about to be logged out
ContactAdmin: Please check with administrator for a valid invite

ExpiredSessionLogoutMsg: You have been logged out due to expired session
ConfirmText: By pressing the back button of the browser, your session will be invalid and all unsaved data will be lost. Are you sure you want to continue?

tooManyOTPRequests: Too many requests, please try again after 15 min
accountTemporarilyLocked: Your account has been temporarily locked for security reasons. Please try again after {{timeout}} minutes
accountTemporarilyLockedFor30Min: Incorrect password. You account is temporarily locked for security reasons. Please try again after 30 minutes
wrongPasswordRetryLeft: Incorrect password. You have {{retriesLeft}} more attempts before you are locked out
pwCannotBeSameAsPrevious: Invalid password : New password cannot be the same as one of the earlier passwords you used
pwCriteriaNotMet: Invalid password : Password does not match required criteria
registerToSee: Register to see Centime in action.
defaultSignupTitle: Our cash management suite enables you to:
defaultSignupText1: Forecast Cash: Gain insights into future cash flows. Plan and manage liquidity. Mitigate risk of business failure.
defaultSignupText2: Automate Accounts Payable: Save money. Boost efficiency. Mitigate fraud. Improve cash flow.
defaultSignupText3: Automate Accounts Receivable: Improve collections effectiveness. Reduce past due payments. Boost working capital.
defaultSignupText4: Get CentimeCredit™: Apply easily. Qualify quickly. Fund immediately. Meet operating needs. Finance growth.
defaultSignupText5: Track and Monitor KPIs: Identify and compare trends. Use standardized benchmarks. Share findings with key stakeholders.
signUpLeftSideSubTitle: Please create your profile to explore Centime's entire cash management suite
secureSignupTitle: <bold>CentimeSecure</bold> is a joint initiative of FNBO and Centime
secureSignupText1: It is safe and secure. Read a <link></link> of how it works.
secureSignupText2: It is a standard banking product offered by many banks
quickBooksSignupTitle: Centime integrates seamlessly with QuickBooks and enables you to:
